00051 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// */
00052 
00053 // motion functions
00054 
00055 
00056 void motion_pin_config (void)
00057 {
00058  DDRA = DDRA | 0x0F;
00059  PORTA = PORTA & 0xF0;
00060  DDRL = DDRL | 0x18;   //Setting PL3 and PL4 pins as output for PWM generation
00061  PORTL = PORTL | 0x18; //PL3 and PL4 pins are for velocity control using PWM.
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 //Function used for setting motor's direction
00067 void motion_set (unsigned char Direction)
00068 {
00069  unsigned char PortARestore = 0;
00070 
00071  Direction &= 0x0F;    // removing upper nibbel as it is not needed
00072  PortARestore = PORTA;    // reading the PORTA's original status
00073  PortARestore &= 0xF0;    // setting lower direction nibbel to 0
00074  PortARestore |= Direction;  // adding lower nibbel for direction command and restoring the PORTA status
00075  PORTA = PortARestore;    // setting the command to the port
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 /*#define MOVE_FWD forward()
00081 #define MOVE_REV back()
00082 #define MOVE_LEFT left()
00083 #define MOVE_RIGHT right()
00084 #define MOVE_SOFT_RIGHT soft_right()
00085 #define MOVE_SOFT_LEFT soft_left()
00086 #define MOVE_INPLACE_RIGHT inplace_right()
00087 #define MOVE_INPLACE_LEFT inplace_left()*/
00088 
00089 
00090 void MOVE_FWD(void) //both wheels forward
00091 {
00092   motion_set(0x06);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void MOVE_REV(void) //both wheels backward
00096 {
00097   motion_set(0x09);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void MOVE_LEFT(void) //Left wheel backward, Right wheel forward
00101 {
00102   motion_set(0x05);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void MOVE_RIGHT(void) //Left wheel forward, Right wheel backward
00106 {
00107   motion_set(0x0A);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void MOVE_SOFT_LEFT (void) //Left wheel stationary, Right wheel forward
00111 {
00112  motion_set(0x04);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void MOVE_SOFT_RIGHT (void) //Left wheel forward, Right wheel is stationary
00116 {
00117  motion_set(0x02);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void MOVE_INPLACE_LEFT(void) //Left wheel backward, right wheel stationary
00121 {
00122  motion_set(0x01);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void MOVE_INPLACE_RIGHT (void) //Left wheel stationary, Right wheel backward
00126 {
00127  motion_set(0x08);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void STOP (void)
00131 {
00132   motion_set(0x00);
00133 }
00134

00138 
00139 // Timer 5 initialised in PWM mode for velocity control
00140 // Prescale:64
00141 // PWM 8bit fast, TOP=0x00FF
00142 // Timer Frequency:674.988Hz
00143 void timer5_init()
00144 {
00145  TCCR5B = 0x00; //Stop
00146  TCNT5H = 0xFF; //Counter higher 8-bit value to which OCR5xH value is compared with
00147  TCNT5L = 0x01; //Counter lower 8-bit value to which OCR5xH value is compared with
00148  OCR5AH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Left Motor
00149  OCR5AL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Left Motor
00150  OCR5BH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Right Motor
00151  OCR5BL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Right Motor
00152  OCR5CH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Motor C1
00153  OCR5CL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Motor C1
00154  TCCR5A = 0xA9; /*{COM5A1=1, COM5A0=0; COM5B1=1, COM5B0=0; COM5C1=1 COM5C0=0}
00155         For Overriding normal port functionalit to OCRnA outputs.
00156          {WGM51=0, WGM50=1} Along With WGM52 in TCCR5B for Selecting FAST PWM 8-bit Mode*/
00157  
00158  TCCR5B = 0x0B; //WGM12=1; CS12=0, CS11=1, CS10=1 (Prescaler=64)
00159 }
00160 
00161 // Function for robot velocity control
00162 // Make sure that you pass only unsigned char value.
00163 
00164 
00165 void velocity (unsigned char left_motor, unsigned char right_motor)
00166 {
00167  OCR5AL = (unsigned char)left_motor;
00168  OCR5BL = (unsigned char)right_motor;
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 void MOTOR_LEFT_SPEED(int val)
00173 {
00174     if ( val > 254 )   //limiting the max velocity
00175     val = 255; 
00176     OCR5AL = (unsigned char) val;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void MOTOR_RIGHT_SPEED(int val)
00180 {
00181   if ( val > 254 )     //limiting the max velocity
00182    val = 255;
00183   OCR5BL = (unsigned char) val;
00184 }
